cast.name: 赫苏斯·佛朗哥 Jesús Franco

introduction: Jesus Franco, also known as Jess Franco, was one of the biggest names in cinema "B" worldwide. With more than 200 works and a large and peculiar use of pseudonyms, his work remains difficult to categorize, which makes it more exciting if possible. Through a series of interviews with Franco, "Call him Jess Redux" about the viewer sadist, esoteric and erotic world of the director, as refined as rogue. This new version of "Call him Jesus" (2000), considered the documentary reference Franco and directed by Carles Prats and Manel Mayol, incorporates new unpublished statements irreducible Madrid filmmaker and pays homage to his muse and companion, Lina Romay incorporating their active presence the story.
